+! { dg-options "-pedantic -mdalign" { target sh*-*-* } }
+!
+! PR fortran/50273
+!
+subroutine test()
+   character :: a
+   integer   :: b
+   character :: c
+   common /global_var/ a, b, c ! { dg-warning "Padding of 3 bytes required before 'b' in COMMON" }
+   print *, a, b, c
+end subroutine test
